summary: AuthGate was updated to reference a new versioned login image path and to render it with object-contain (no crop). However, the new image asset file itself was not added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and there are unrelated/speculative changes in metadata/summary files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-uploaded image file "WhatsApp-Image-2020-10-24-at-11.11.10-PM-4.jpeg" to frontend/public/assets/generated using a new versioned filename (different from login-logo-v2.dim_512x512.jpeg).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no new files added (ADDED FILES: none), so the required new static asset file is not present in the change set.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated app/theme/document feature changes described in frontend-file-summaries.txt (e.g., AppShell header/logo changes, document pages/filters/query changes, global OKLCH theme token changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly about replacing the login image and preventing cropping; these additional features are not requested. The only concrete evidence is that the summary file was modified to claim these changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking metadata updates (new_feature_requests entries, known_issues/isFixRequest fields) in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; this is project bookkeeping not required to replace the login image.
